\newcommand{\ottt}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{t}  ,\ \ottnt{c}  ,\ \ottnt{v}  ,\ \ottnt{s}  ,\ \ottnt{n}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{triv} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{ctag} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A}  .  \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{0}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottT}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{T}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Unit} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Nat} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottR}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{R}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Unit} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Nat} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ ? \to ? }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottctag}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{ctag}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \ottnt{A} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{ctag}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{ctag'} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{ctag} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottA}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{A}  ,\ \ottnt{B}  ,\ \ottnt{C}  ,\ \ottnt{D}  ,\ \ottnt{E}  ,\ \ottnt{S}  ,\ \ottnt{U}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Unit} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Nat} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{\mbox{?}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottG}{
\ottrulehead{\Gamma}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \cdot }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{}}

\ottrulehead{\ottnt{vd}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\vdash}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\not \vdash}{}{}{}{}}

 \ottnt{A}  \sim  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdrulereflName}{}%

}{
 \ottnt{A}  \sim  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleunboxName}[0]{\ottdrulename{unbox}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleunbox}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \sim  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleunboxName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulearrowName}[0]{\ottdrulename{arrow}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulearrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulearrowName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleprodName}[0]{\ottdrulename{prod}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleprod}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \sim   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \times  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleprodName}{}%
}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerefl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulebox{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleunbox{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulearrow{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleprod{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXvarName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_var}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} \, \in \, \Gamma}%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXvarName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXunitName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_unit}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXunit}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }   \mathsf{triv}   :   \mathsf{Unit}  }{%
{\ottdruleSXXunitName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXzeroName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_zero}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXzero}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottsym{0}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }{%
{\ottdruleSXXzeroName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXsuccName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_succ}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXsucc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \mathsf{nat}( \ottnt{A} ) =   \mathsf{Nat}   }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }{%
{\ottdruleSXXsuccName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXpairName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_pair}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXpair}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleSXXpairName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXfstName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_fst}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXfst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \mathsf{prod}( \ottnt{B} ) =   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXfstName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXsndName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_snd}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXsnd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \mathsf{prod}( \ottnt{B} ) =   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXsndName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXlamName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_lam}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXlam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }   \lambda  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  .  \ottnt{t}   :  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXlamName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXappName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_app}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{C} }%
\ottpremise{    \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}     \quad   \mathsf{fun}( \ottnt{C} ) =  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXappName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnstype}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A} $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXunit{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXzero{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXsucc{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXpair{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXfst{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXsnd{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXlam{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXapp{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXsuccName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_succ}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXpairName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_pair}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXpair}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleCXXpairName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXfstName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_fst}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXfst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXfstName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXsndName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_snd}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXsnd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXsndName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXlamName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_lam}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXlam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }   \lambda  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  .  \ottnt{t}   :  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXlamName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXappName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_app}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXappName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXcastName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_cast}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXcast}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \ottnt{A}  \sim  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{t}  :    \ottnt{A}   \Rightarrow   \ottnt{B}     \ottsym{)}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXcastName}{}%
}}

%% defn redA
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXvaluesName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_values}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXvalues}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{v}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXvaluesName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastIdName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_castId}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastId}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottnt{T} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \ottnt{v}  :    \ottnt{T}   \Rightarrow   \ottnt{T}     \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXcastIdName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastUName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_castU}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastU}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \ottnt{v}  :    \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \Rightarrow   \ottsym{\mbox{?}}     \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXcastUName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXsucceedName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_succeed}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXsucceed}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottnt{R} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \ottnt{v}  :      \ottnt{R}   \Rightarrow   \ottsym{\mbox{?}}     \Rightarrow   \ottnt{R}     \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{R}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXsucceedName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastArrowName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_castArrow}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastArrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{    \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}     \quad   \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \sim  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :    \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{)}   \Rightarrow   \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}     \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow     \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :    \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \Rightarrow   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}     \ottsym{)}   :    \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \Rightarrow   \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}      \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXcastArrowName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastGroundName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_castGround}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastGround}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{      \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \ottnt{A}  \sim  \ottnt{R}     \quad   \ottnt{A}  \neq  \ottnt{R}     \quad   \ottnt{A}  \neq  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \ottnt{v}  :    \ottnt{A}   \Rightarrow   \ottsym{\mbox{?}}     \rightsquigarrow   \ottnt{v}  :      \ottnt{A}   \Rightarrow   \ottnt{R}     \Rightarrow   \ottsym{\mbox{?}}     \ottsym{:}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXcastGroundName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastExpandName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_castExpand}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastExpand}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{      \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \quad   \ottnt{A}  \sim  \ottnt{R}     \quad   \ottnt{A}  \neq  \ottnt{R}     \quad   \ottnt{A}  \neq  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \ottnt{v}  :    \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \Rightarrow   \ottnt{A}     \rightsquigarrow   \ottnt{v}  :      \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \Rightarrow   \ottnt{R}     \Rightarrow   \ottnt{A}     \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXcastExpandName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXbetaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_beta}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXbeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \lambda  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  .  \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{v}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXbetaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXappOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_app1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXappOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXappOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXappTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_app2}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXappTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{v} \, \ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{v} \, \ottnt{t'}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXappTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXfstName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_fst}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXfst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'}  \ottsym{:}   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t'}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXfstName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXsndName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_snd}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXsnd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'}  \ottsym{:}   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t'}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXsndName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXpairOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_pair1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXpairOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{:}   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXpairOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXpairTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_pair2}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXpairTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{:}   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXpairTwoName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnredA}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXvalues{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXcastId{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXcastU{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXsucceed{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXcastArrow{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXcastGround{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXcastExpand{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXbeta{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXappOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXappTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXfst{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXsnd{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXpairOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXpairTwo{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn castIn
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXvarName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_var}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} \, \in \, \Gamma}%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \boxdotRight  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXvarName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXzeroName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_zero}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXzero}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{0}  \boxdotRight  \ottsym{0}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXzeroName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXtrivName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_triv}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXtriv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{triv}   \boxdotRight   \mathsf{triv}   :   \mathsf{Unit}  }{%
{\ottdruleciXXtrivName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsuccOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_succOne}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsuccOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :    \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \Rightarrow    \mathsf{Nat}      \ottsym{)}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }{%
{\ottdruleciXXsuccOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsuccTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_succTwo}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsuccTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }{%
{\ottdruleciXXsuccTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXpairName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_pair}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXpair}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \boxdotRight  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  \ottsym{)}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleciXXpairName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXfstOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_fstOne}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXfstOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :    \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \Rightarrow   \ottsym{(}   \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \times  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \ottsym{)}     \ottsym{)}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXfstOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXfstTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_fstTwo}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXfstTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \ottnt{A}  \times  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXfstTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsndOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_sndOne}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsndOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :    \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \Rightarrow   \ottsym{(}   \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \times  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \ottsym{)}     \ottsym{)}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXsndOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsndTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_sndTwo}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXsndTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \ottnt{A}  \times  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXsndTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXlamName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_lam}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXlam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash   \lambda  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  .  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \boxdotRight   \lambda  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  .  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXlamName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXappOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_app1}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXappOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  :    \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \Rightarrow   \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \ottsym{)}     \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXappOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXappTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_app2}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXappTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B} }%
\ottpremise{    \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}     \quad   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \neq  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}} \, \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  :    \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \Rightarrow   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}     \ottsym{)}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXappTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXappThreeName}[0]{\ottdrulename{ci\_app3}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleciXXappThree}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{4}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleciXXappThreeName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefncastIn}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \boxdotRight  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A} $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXzero{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXtriv{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXsuccOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXsuccTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXpair{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXfstOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXfstTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXsndOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXsndTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXlam{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXappOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXappTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleciXXappThree{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsReduction}{
\ottdefnredA{}\ottdefncastIn{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsTyping
\ottdefnsReduction
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
